resources.string: Hello and welcome! This is my portfolio, By clicking the \"Projects\" button you can view my previous projects i have worked on. Clicking the \"Artwork\" button will show you some of my designs. The "Profile\" button will take you a short informatory text about me in both my personal life and professional life. Lastly you find links to my social accounts by clicking the \"Social\" button.

Hello! I am 34 years old and live in Stockholm, where I am currently studying application development in KYH College. I also have union training as a safety representative and have good knowledge of union and work environment. I am a dedicated worker who is happy to take a little longer to learn new tasks and to learn correct from the start, I have a easy time getting along with people.
This is a blender project i did during comunity college. i designed the hammer and the can and created the animation and the interface

This is my BMI Calculator which was my first freestanding project in my education a simple layout with inputs for height and weight with a button that runs calculations and a display that shows results.
This calculator is the first group project we worked on, we were a team of four and i handled the layout and UI design while my team took care of t he code and the graphic design elements
This is my Portfolio app with functionalities like scrolling, links and a meny at the top. This app showcases my progress.
This is my Notepad app that lets you add,save,edit and delete notes on your phone.
This is my Restaurant menu project, you click on a button (starters,maincourse,desert) and the information swaps back and forth depending on what you click.
